item.title: Trump's DHS offers $1,000 stipends, travel assistance to immigrants who 'self-deport'
item.description: DHS says the program will save money because it currently costs around $17,000 to arrest, detain and remove an undocumented immigrant.

item.title: Bessent to Milken conference: Trump will make America 'more appealing for investors like you'
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent sketched out the roadmap of President Donald Trump's economic agenda in a pitch to a room full of global investors.

item.title: Trump says U.S. girls 'could be very happy' with lots fewer dolls under new tariffs
item.description: Trump is downplaying the economic impact on U.S. consumers from his new, high tariffs on imports from China.

item.title: Incoming German Chancellor Merz vows reforms and investments as parties sign coalition agreement
item.description: Germany's incoming Chancellor Friedrich Merz and the country's new cabinet are set to take office Tuesday.

item.title: Trump takes credit for 'good parts' of economy, blames 'bad parts' on Biden
item.description: Last week, Trump put the onus on Biden for the economy contracting in the first quarter of the year.
